statements: SELECT * FROM EquipmentFailureData;
SELECT equipment_id, failure_date FROM EquipmentFailureData WHERE failure_type = 'mechanical';
SELECT equipment_id, failure_date, failure_description FROM EquipmentFailureData WHERE failure_type = 'electrical' ORDER BY failure_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, failure_type FROM EquipmentFailureData WHERE failure_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM EquipmentFailureData WHERE failure_description LIKE '%fault%';
SELECT * FROM EquipmentFailureData WHERE failure_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT equipment_id, failure_type FROM EquipmentFailureData WHERE failure_type = 'Hardware';
SELECT failure_date, failure_description FROM EquipmentFailureData WHERE equipment_id = '5e6cd7a0-5d7d-4b95-9a13-294a16690c48';
SELECT * FROM EquipmentFailureData WHERE failure_type LIKE 'Software%';
SELECT equipment_id, failure_date, failure_type FROM EquipmentFailureData ORDER BY failure_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM equipment_failure_data;
SELECT equipment_name, failure_type FROM equipment_failure_data WHERE failure_type='mechanical';
SELECT equipment_name, failure_date FROM equipment_failure_data WHERE equipment_name='Printer' ORDER BY failure_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, failure_type, information FROM equipment_failure_data WHERE failure_type='electrical' AND equipment_name='Server';
SELECT equipment_name, failure_date, information FROM equipment_failure_data WHERE failure_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM equipment_failure_data WHERE failure_type = 'mechanical' ORDER BY failure_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, failure_type FROM equipment_failure_data WHERE equipment_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND failure_type = 'electrical';
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, failure_date FROM equipment_failure_data WHERE failure_type = 'software' AND equipment_name LIKE '%computer%';

SELECT equipment_id, failure_type, information FROM equipment_failure_data JOIN preventive_maintenance_schedule ON equipment_failure_data.equipment_id = preventive_maintenance_schedule.equipment_id WHERE preventive_maintenance_schedule.status = 'pending';

SELECT preventive_maintenance_schedule.maintenance_id, preventive_maintenance_schedule.scheduled_date, equipment_failure_data.failure_type FROM preventive_maintenance_schedule INNER JOIN equipment_failure_data ON preventive_maintenance_schedule.equipment_id = equipment_failure_data.equipment_id WHERE preventive_maintenance_schedule.technician = 'John Doe' AND equipment_failure_data.failure_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM EquipmentFailureData WHERE failure_type = 'Hardware Failure';
SELECT id, equipment_id, failure_type FROM EquipmentFailureData WHERE equipment_id = 1001;
SELECT id, equipment_id, failure_timestamp FROM EquipmentFailureData ORDER BY failure_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, equipment_id, failure_timestamp FROM EquipmentFailureData WHERE failure_type = 'Software Failure' ORDER BY failure_timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, equipment_id, failure_timestamp FROM EquipmentFailureData WHERE failure_type != 'Unknown' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM EquipmentFailureData WHERE failure_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND failure_type = 'Mechanical'
SELECT equipment_id, failure_type FROM EquipmentFailureData WHERE id = 5 ORDER BY failure_timestamp DESC
SELECT id, failure_type FROM EquipmentFailureData WHERE failure_type LIKE '%Electrical%'
SELECT * FROM PreventiveMaintenanceSchedule WHERE scheduled_date < CURRENT_DATE AND maintenance_type IN ('Checkup', 'Cleaning')
SELECT equipment_id, monitoring_status FROM RemoteMonitoringSystem WHERE monitoring_status = 'Critical' ORDER BY last_updated
SELECT * FROM equipment_failure_data;
SELECT equipment_id, failure_time FROM equipment_failure_data WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT system_id, system_name FROM remote_monitoring_system ORDER BY system_id DESC;
SELECT data_id, analysis_date, analysis_result FROM analysis_data WHERE analysis_result LIKE '%fail%';
SELECT schedule_id, maintenance_type, schedule_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE schedule_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM equipment_failure_data LIMIT 5;
SELECT equipment_id, failure_time, failure_description FROM equipment_failure_data WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT system_name, location FROM remote_monitoring_system ORDER BY system_name DESC;
SELECT maintenance_type, schedule_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE schedule_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT equipment_failure_data.equipment_id, equipment_failure_data.failure_description, analysis_data.analysis_result FROM equipment_failure_data JOIN analysis_data ON equipment_failure_data.equipment_id = analysis_data.system_id;
SELECT * FROM equipment_failure_data;
SELECT equipment_id, failure_description FROM equipment_failure_data WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_id, failure_date FROM equipment_failure_data WHERE failure_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT equipment_id, failure_description FROM equipment_failure_data ORDER BY failure_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, COUNT(*) AS total_failures FROM equipment_failure_data GROUP BY equipment_id;
SELECT * FROM equipment_failure_data ORDER BY failure_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Computer';

SELECT equipment_failure_data.failure_date, equipment.equipment_name, monitoring_system.status FROM equipment_failure_data JOIN equipment ON equipment_failure_data.equipment_id = equipment.equipment_id JOIN monitoring_system ON equipment_failure_data.equipment_id = monitoring_system.equipment_id WHERE monitoring_system.status = 'Operational';
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM equipment WHERE equipment_type IN ('Printer', 'Scanner') AND equipment_name LIKE '%Office%';

SELECT preventive_maintenance.maintenance_id, maintenance_type, start_date, end_date FROM preventive_maintenance JOIN maintenance_schedule ON preventive_maintenance.maintenance_id = maintenance_schedule.maintenance_id WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
